text: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

text: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: Give me six hours to chop down a tree and I will spend the first four sharpening the axe.
author: Abraham Lincoln

text: Plans are nothing; planning is everything.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
author: Chinese Proverb

text: Failing to plan is planning to fail.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: A plan is a bridge between where you are and where you want to be.
author: Unknown

text: The secret to getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

text: Plans are worthless, but planning is everything.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower
